timeline.message: remove unused field 'overrideBlockEntities' from BlockRegionComponent (not used in Omega)

timeline.body:
I'd try to push the use of `JomlUtils` as far outwards as possible and do the computation all in JOML already 🤔 
```suggestion
                    Vector3i location = JomlUtil.from(new org.joml.Vector3i(blockRegion.region.center(new Vector3f()), org.joml.RoundingMode.HALF_UP));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I'd try to push the use of JomlUtils as far outwards as possible and do the computation all in JOML already 🤔

Suggested change
Vector3i location = new Vector3i(JomlUtil.from(blockRegion.region.center(new Vector3f())), RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
Vector3i location = JomlUtil.from(new org.joml.Vector3i(blockRegion.region.center(new Vector3f()), org.joml.RoundingMode.HALF_UP));
timeline.author: skaldarnar

timeline.body:
This should also work with the in-place variant, shouldn't it? Removing from the map does not store it for later, I'd think ^^
```suggestion
        for (org.joml.Vector3i pos : BlockRegions.iterableInPlace(oldRegion)) {
```

timeline.message: test: add parameterized tests for BlockRegions#encompassing
test: fix expected center point of empty `new BlockRegion()`
fix: define center() for invalid BlockRegions
return NaN instead of positive INF for center of invalid region

feat: use `iterableInPlace` for removing pos

Co-authored-by: Tobias Nett <skaldarnar@googlemail.com>
